titleStmt.title: Malice defeated, or, A brief relation of the accusation and deliverance of Elizabeth Cellier wherein her proceedings both before and during her confinement are particularly related and the Mystery of the meal-tub fully discovered : together with an abstract of her arraignment and tryal, written by her self, for the satisfaction of all lovers of undisguised truth.
titleStmt.author: Cellier, Elizabeth, fl. 1680.

notesStmt.note: "The matchless picaro ... Tomaso Ganderfields" with caption title, appears on p. [45]
Inserted after p. 42 is a leaf containing "A post script to the impartial readers," dated Aug. 21, 1680, & signed: Elizabeth Cellier.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
